predicate.note: Frames file for 'snare' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment.

role.descr: explicit mention of snare (usually when metaphorical)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: Also trying [*-1] to snare a portion of the $2 billion-a-year industry is Agfa Corp., a unit of Bayer AG.
example.arg: a portion of the $2 billion-a-year industry
[*-1] -> Agfa Corp., a unit of Bayer AG

example.name: with snare
example.text: Mary snared John with her smoldering eyes and promises of chocolate cake.
example.arg: her smoldering eyes and promises of chocolate cake
